overview:
Mike Barnes is an Internet Marketeer for over 15 years.

He has been a sportsman his entire life, first as a top ranking snow skier, later on a professional water-skier and hang glider. After retiring from his sports career he took all he learned about coaching and goal setting into a whole new world, the Internet.

No matter what you are trying to promote in Cyber-Space, the goal is to be visible for people trying to find you. One of the best ways for long term results is to optimize your company through Search Engine Optimization (SEO) via Social Networking, article submissions, bookmarking, videoâ€™s and more!

Today, by using Social Media like Facebook, Twitter and many other social media websites, he and the team at SEO Alien create a Matrix of high ranking links around your website that drives them to the top of the search engines.

After all, as a true sportsman, he likes to beat the competition! With his passion and experience for what he does, you will enjoy everything he has to share as much as he enjoys teaching it!

video_embeds.description: How to Build a Strong Internet Presence
